annonstext:
At Tetra Pak we touch millions of lives every day, ensuring better nutrition and healthier lifestyles through safe packaging and food processing solutions. Guided by our global brand promise, PROTECTS WHAT´S GOOD, we strive to make a difference by protecting food, people and our futures. To do this we need more than smart technology. We need smart people too. People like you, who wants to work with people like us.

Tetra Pak design and deliver dairy processing lines and plants all over the world. FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Sweden we have a team supporting our global organization with the aim to bring optimal solutions to the continuously growing global Dairy market. The Dairy Chilled team in Business Unit Liquid Food is now looking for a Senior Dairy Technologist to strengthen the team.

Within dairy chilled we work with solutions for processing of all dairy products for chilled distribution, e.g. consumption milk, cream and yoghurt. 

As Senior Dairy Technologist, you will together with our existing dairy technologist team be a key person in the global dairy organization, driving technology development, supporting sales and order fulfillment both within the Business Unit, to our market companies and to our customers. 

We offer you a challenging position in a highly qualified team and close cooperation with sales and market companies all over the world. 

The position is based in Lund, Sweden, and includes 20-30% travelling. 

What you will do

	Take ownership of and drive technology development within Dairy Chilled and Fermented including technology scouting 
	Train and drive the competence development of our global organization within the area of food and processing technology   
	Support sales team with food technology expertise and product knowledge to provide best practice production solutions
	Support customers with food technology expertise, trouble shooting and audits of their production facilities 

Who you are

We are looking for a highly self-motivated and outgoing person. You enjoy being the expert, sharing your knowledge and inspiring people. You have ability to listen and to absorb customer needs to build a good market 

understanding. You have a strong commercial focus and are keen to combine this with your food technology competence. 

Your personal drive is strong and you like taking overall responsibility. Your communication skills are excellent, and you have the ability to build trust and good relations with global colleagues, in both sales and technically oriented positions.

You hold a university degree in food technology, food chemistry or equivalent. You have minimum 5 years’ practical experience from the dairy industry, preferably in dairy products, production or processes.

Your English skills are excellent, spoken as well as written. 

We offer you

	Variety of exciting challenges with ample opportunities for development and training in a truly global landscape
	Culture that pioneers spirit of innovation where our engineering genius drives visible result
	Equal opportunity employment experience that values difference and diversity
	Market competitive compensation and benefits with flexible working arrangements

Apply now!

If you are inspired to share our responsibility of protecting food to protecting the planet, apply through our careers page on www.jobs.tetrapak.com. 

This job posting expires on April 3rd. 

To know more about the position contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO .

Questions about your application contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO . 

For trade union information contact Unionen / FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at 

 TELEPHONENO or Sveriges Ingenjörer/FIRSTNAME LASTNAME at  TELEPHONENO .
